snippet.title: Songs for a Hero 2: March of Malachi (Crowdfund Trailer)
snippet.description: Songs for a Hero 2: March of Malachi is a 2D musical platform game that follows up the innovative Songs for a Hero. In this extraordinary adventure, you will take on the role of a new hero, and this time he won't sing alone. We took the musical feature to a new level by adding new singers, rhythm animations for enemies, puzzles and epic musical boss fights. Have fun exploring a world that responds to your actions in a musical way and find your inner hero to stand a chance against Malachi's terrible army.
